EnableChecker.short_help: Enables or disables drawing a checker underlay

LoadFile.short_help: Load and display the contents of a file

AreGuidesShown.short_help: Returns true if image guides are being displayed on the view

AreControlsShown.short_help: Returns true if controls are being displayed on the view

ShowControls.short_help: Shows or hides controls on the view

GetRotTable.short_help: Get the rotation angles of the view as a table
GetRotTable.description:
Returns:
       x = table[1]
       y = table[2]
       z = table[3]

GetRot.short_help: Get the rotation angles of the view

GetAlphaOverlayColor.short_help: Return which alpha overlay is being used
GetAlphaOverlayColor.description: 0 = None, 1 = Red, 2 = Green, 3 = Yellow, 4 = Blue, 5 = Cyan, 6 = Magenta, 7 = White.

ResetView.short_help: Resets the display to default position etc

SetChannel.description: When "toggle" is true, the first SetChannel(CHAN_Z) call will set the viewer to Z, while the second SetChannel(CHAN_Z) call will set the viewer to CHAN_COLOR

ShowGuides.short_help: Shows or hides guides on the view

SetAlphaOverlayColor.short_help: Select which alpha overlay to use
SetAlphaOverlayColor.description: 0 = None, 1 = Red, 2 = Green, 3 = Yellow, 4 = Blue, 5 = Cyan, 6 = Magenta, 7 = White.

SetRot.short_help: Set the rotation of the view

GetPosTable.short_help: Get the position of the viewer as a table
GetPosTable.description:
Returns:
       x = table[1]
       y = table[2]
       z = table[3]

GetPos.short_help: Get the position of the viewer

SetPos.short_help: Set the position of the viewer

SetScale.short_help:
Set the scale (zoom) of the view
Scale of 0 indicates Fit to View

GetAspectCorrection.short_help: Returns true if the viewer is correcting the aspect of images

GetScale.short_help: Get the scale (zoom) of the view
